author: Soureek89
body:
Updating topHLTDQMOffline package under DQMOffline/Trigger so that it is able to read from "hltTriggerSummaryAOD" collection (present in both Data and MC) in addition to "hltTriggerSummaryRaw" collection (present in MC only and not in Data). Tested code to be ok by running the matrix for TTbar events.  
Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_0_X #13245 (original by @Soureek89).
title: Soureek updating topHLTDQMOffline package under DQMOffline/Trigger
